src.utils.timeline_generator
============================

.. py:module:: src.utils.timeline_generator


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   src.utils.timeline_generator.events


Functions

.. autoapisummary::

   src.utils.timeline_generator.parse_timeline

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: parse_timeline(output_file)

.. py:function:: create_timeline(events, filename, duration)

   Create a timeline plot with custom colors for different event types.

   :param events: A list of tuples where each tuple contains the event type, timestamp, and description.
   :param filename: The name of the PNG file to save the timeline to.


.. py:data:: events
   :value: [('File Created', 1, '#C80036'), ('File Modified', 2, '#7ABA78'), ('Process Spawned', 6,...
